name: OpenLMIS
description: Software to support national supply chains manage medical supplies and avoid stockouts
SDGevidence:
Mission/vision: https://openlmis.org/about/
Impact: https://openlmis.org/impact/
OpenLMIS reduces the occurrence of product stockouts and improves national supply chain management practices. OpenLMIS strengthens national health systems in a sustainable way by increasing visibility of logistics data across the supply chain and promoting informed decision-making.
